segments.text: I'm observing this line drawing of a kitchen, noticing all the small details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so completely absorbed in her task of drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is becoming a significant problem, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm frankly disgusted by the waste of water and the potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's attempt to steal cookies is a classic move, but quite risky here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised at how still and focused they both are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tilted stool just makes my stomach clench with anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly frustrating that the adult is so tuned out; it makes me angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene makes me feel quite agitated, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to reach in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect storm of unnoticed problems.
segments.speaker: PAR
